reference.title: cxxStruct module
reference.shortdesc: Defines a top-level container for all the elements to describe a C++ struct.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxStruct> topic type contains elements necessary to specify the name of the struct. To describe the member variables and functions insert <cxxFunction> and <cxxVariable> elements into the cxxStruct module.
The cxxStruct topic contains the following elements:
